items.title: Collaborative Task Boards
items.description: Implement task boards that allow multiple team members to create, assign, and update tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee
Multiple users can view and edit the same board simultaneously with changes reflected in real-time
Tasks can be moved between columns representing different statuses
System logs changes with user and timestamp
non_functional: Real-time updates must have latency under 500ms
UI must be responsive across desktop and mobile devices

notes: No actionable feedback provided. Original assumptions retained. Further clarification still needed on additional collaboration tools such as chat or file sharing.
